title: Idea for icons
body: For some of the icon(especially the new one) it should change the background of your profile to a corresponding skin (e.g. the new super galaxy kindred icon should change ur background to a super galaxy skin) much like how DJ sona, Spirit guard udyr or PFE change the background. This would make buying icon much more desirable plus those art work look really nice.

replies.body:
Hey dude. Check out this thread here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client/30lvrHzO-suggestion-for-backgrounds?comment=00000001

We discuss the use of background pictures and icons. Hope this  would prove insightful to you.
